name: ThrillCapital
overview:
Crowdfunding in Sports and Entertainment

  • Fan funded Venture Capital

Bridging the gap between talent and success across Sports and Entertainment by allowing fans to invest in and trade their passion.

For Fans

At ThrillCapital we want to give you the experience of being a Sports and Entertainment insider, to make you feel just like a player or team manager, except with a lot more flexibility. You already invest emotionally in sports and entertainment, we want to help you invest financially.

For Talent

Are you a future star? Register and upload your profile onto our social network. Help build your fan base. If you have what it takes and generate a lot of fan support, we will provide you with a clear path to funding to help launch your career.

Crowdfunding in Sports and Entertainment

Are you a talented individual or team wanting to show off your ability to the world but lack the funding to get there?

We help fund talented sports people, up-andcoming movie directors, TV show producers, the next Beckham or Hamilton… You name it, we provide a path to funding that helps talent and teams across the Sports and Entertainment spectrum realise their ultimate potential.

Support your favourite Band, Film maker or up and coming Sports star and you could find yourself backstage, at a film premiere or exclusive post match celebration.
